title: ‘It’s Ridiculous, a Joke’: Filippo Ganna Wins Volta ao Algarve Stage 1 After Scores of Riders Take Wrong Turn in Final
content:
Ganna reaps the rewars after scores of riders diverted down road parallel to finishing straight in Algarve.

Read the full article at ‘It’s Ridiculous, a Joke’: Filippo Ganna Wins Volta ao Algarve Stage 1 After Scores of Riders Take Wrong Turn in Final on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
